title: ADP Price Check + Improved Offenses, Counting is Hard - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/23
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a look at where certain players are being drafted in early mock drafts! Will the ADP change for Terry McLaurin and George Kittle when real drafts are happening? Plus, offenses that can take a step forward, and a new edition of Best Ball Breakdown! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 23rd, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(05:05) - Improved Offenses: More Points!
(11:00) - NFL News
(18:05) - ADP Price Check
(18:20) - Terry McLaurin
(23:20) - Breece Hall
(28:25) - Dak Prescott
(35:50) - George Kittle
(42:15) - Chris Olave
(48:05) - Best Ball Breakdown
